page.title: 14Established Businesses.
page.content: A. and B. Smith is situated in Market Street,Craven Arms.It is a family business specialising in calor gas.They employ 3 people two of which work in the shop and one in the office.All of the staff do training courses and live in the Craven Arms Church Stretton area.The wages average from 70 pounds to 100 pounds per week. A. and B. Smith mainly sell cookers and fires.All the cookers are tested before they go on show and each is guaranteed for 12 months.Many are British made a few Spanish or Italian. The average price of a cooker is about 300 pounds.A. and B.Smith are responsible for servicing and repairing calor appliances. The shop opens at 9.00 a.m. and closes at 5.30 p.m. having one hour for lunch. Half day closing is on a Wednesday.
